Baltic Blues

Slip into the shadows of the Baltic Sea
as a daring captain on a secret mission.

Your goal?
Cut undersea cables
while your anchor drags along the sea floor,
all without being spotted
by vigilant patrols.

Keep your anchor up
when patrols are close by
to avoid detection.
Reel your anchor in
to stay undetected.

Stealth, precision, and strategy
are your only allies.

Game over!

← Back

↓ Lower anchor

↑ Reel anchor
